ProductInfo.Features:
Factory Refurbished to operate as new. May show minor cosmetic wear. Includes USB computer cable, AC wall charger, Wrist Strap, Battery, and Quick Start Guide.
14.2 megapixel resolution with high-quality still images and video recordings The Samsung Smart Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom features SMART Mode, 720p HD Movie Recording and SMART Camera 2.0 functionality
Samsung 4.0-72.0mm zoom lens with 18x optical zoom Equivalent to a 24-432mm lens on an analog camera with Normal AF, Macro, Auto Macro, Manual Focus
3.0" TFT LCD screen with image editing features Featuring Hybrid Touch User Interface
Built-in flash with Red-Eye Reduction, Fill-In Flash and Slow-Sync Flash
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB200 Digital Smart Camera Wi-Fi Touchscreen LCD Panorama HD Video 14.2MP 18x Optical Zoom (White) - Factory Refurbished
